title: Remove Germany targeting from Apex Mo...

messages.content: Remove Germany targeting from Apex Motors

âœ… **Germany targeting removed successfully from Apex Motors campaign!**

**Changes Applied:**
- **Removed:** Germany (DE) from geo targeting
- **Previous targeting:** US, UK, DE
- **New targeting:** US, UK

**Context:** Germany had the lowest performance with only 0.04% CTR (compared to 0.14% in US and UK), so removing it will allow the budget to be reallocated to better-performing markets.

**Estimated Impact:**
- Reach will decrease by approximately 10%
- However, overall campaign efficiency and ROI should improve by focusing spend on US and UK where engagement is 3.5x higher

**Notifications:**
- Slack notification sent to #adcp-demo
- Email draft generated for the team

The campaign will now focus exclusively on the US and UK markets where user engagement is significantly stronger.
